results.summary: CCTV images have been released of the man who killed 16-year-old Christina Edkins boarding the bus prior to her being stabbed.
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/c716b2bc-e66b-df44-9791-8d32bb0e6a08"><paragraph>CCTV images have been released of the man who killed 16-year-old Christina Edkins boarding the bus in Birmingham prior to her being stabbed.</paragraph><paragraph>Phillip Simelane, from Walsall, has been detained indefinitely under the Mental Health Act after killing the teenager in a random attack as she made her way to school in March.</paragraph><paragraph>The 23-year-old admitted manslaughter in a hearing at Birmingham Crown Court.</paragraph><paragraph>Images of him boarding the bus have been released by West Midlands Police.</paragraph></body>

70236820.caption: Simelane was on the bus for more than two-and-a-half hours
